text: Louis Johnson (April 13, 1955 - May 21, 2015) was an American bass guitarist. Johnson was best known for his group The Brothers Johnson and his session playing on several hit albums of the 1970s and 1980s including the "best selling album of all time" Thriller. Johnson died on May 21, 2015 at the age of 60. "Louis Johnson, Legendary Bassist, Dead at 60", The Boombox.
